vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.21;
son of: Shelah (H7974);
father of: Peleg (H6389) and Joktan (H3355)
Also named: Eber<\i> (Ἐβέρ "Eber" G1443)
§ Eber or Heber = "the region beyond"
1) son of Salah, great grandson of Shem, father of Peleg and Joktan
2) a Gadite chief
3) a Benjamite, son of Elpaal and descendant of Sharahaim
4) a Benjamite, son of Shashak
5) a priest in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   región al otro lado, situada al otro lado de una corriente de agua, o del mar; (2a)   hijo de Sélah; descendiente de Sem; (2b)   hombre; tribu de Gad; (2c)   hijo de Elpáal; tribu de Benjamín; (2d)   hijo de Sasac; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (2e)   sacerdote; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希伯 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "區域以外"
1) 沙拉的兒子, 閃的曾孫, 法勒和約坍的父親
2) 迦得族的主要人物
3) 便雅憫人, 以利巴力的兒子{#代上 8:12|}
4) 便雅憫人, 沙煞的兒子{#代上 8:22|}
5) 約書亞的兒子約雅斤時代的祭司 {#尼 12:20|}
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
希伯 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "区域以外"
1) 沙拉的儿子, 闪的曾孙, 法勒和约坍的父亲
2) 迦得族的主要人物
3) 便雅悯人, 以利巴力的儿子{#代上 8:12|}
4) 便雅悯人, 沙煞的儿子{#代上 8:22|}
5) 约书亚的儿子约雅斤时代的祭司 {#尼 12:20|}

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13;
son of: Abihail (H0032I);
brother of: Michael (H4317H), Meshullam (H4918I), Sheba (H7652), Jorai (H3140), Jacan (H3275) and Zia (H2127)
§ Eber or Heber = "the region beyond"
1) son of Salah, great grandson of Shem, father of Peleg and Joktan
2) a Gadite chief
3) a Benjamite, son of Elpaal and descendant of Sharahaim
4) a Benjamite, son of Shashak
5) a priest in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.12;
son of: Elpaal (H0508);
brother of: Misham (H4936), Shemed (H8106B), Beriah (H1283I), Shema (H8087I), Zebadiah (H2069H), Meshullam (H4918J), Hizki (H2395), Heber (H2268J), Ishmerai (H3461), Izliah (H3152) and Jobab (H3103K)
§ Eber or Heber = "the region beyond"
1) son of Salah, great grandson of Shem, father of Peleg and Joktan
2) a Gadite chief
3) a Benjamite, son of Elpaal and descendant of Sharahaim
4) a Benjamite, son of Shashak
5) a priest in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.22;
son of: Shashak (H8349);
brother of: Ishpan (H3473), Eliel (H0447I), Abdon (H5658I), Zichri (H2147I), Hanan (H2605), Hananiah (H2608O), Elam (H5867), Anthothijah (H6070), Iphdeiah (H3301) and Penuel (H6439I)
§ Eber or Heber = "the region beyond"
1) son of Salah, great grandson of Shem, father of Peleg and Joktan
2) a Gadite chief
3) a Benjamite, son of Elpaal and descendant of Sharahaim
4) a Benjamite, son of Shashak
5) a priest in the days of Joiakim the son of Jeshua

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.12.20
